name: cmdline tools
description: Download the latest cmdline and tui tools.

dotnet_ef.description: Install dotnet entity framework command line utilities

dotnet_azure_functions.description: Install azure function tools azd and azure-function-core-tools-4

manpages.description: Enable man pages for ubuntu base image

just.description: Install just - handy way to save and run project-specific commands - https://github.com/casey/just

difftastic.description: Install difftastic and setup as default git diff tool

tealdeer.description: Install tealdeer a rust implementation of tldr.

gitui.description: Install gitui a terminal ui for git.

lazygit.description: Install lazygit a terminal ui for git.

lazydocker.description: Install lazydocker a terminal ui for docker.

oxker.description: Install oxker a terminal ui for docker.

k9s.description: Install k9s a terminal ui for kubernetes.

jq.description: Install jq a cmdline utility for manipulating json.

yq.description: Install yq a cmdline utility for manipulating yaml, json, xml, csv and tsv.

skopeo.description: Install skopeo to command line utility that performs various operations on container images and image repositories.

syft.description: Install syft a utility to generate a software bill of materials (SBOM).

grype.description: Install grype to find vulnerabilities from a software bill of materials (SBOM).

cosign.description: Install cosign a command line utility that signs container images.

oasdiff.description: Install oasdiff to compare openapi specifications.

net_utils.description: Install network utilities - ping, route, nslookup, dig, nmap, traceroute

rustup.description: Install rustup and lldb to develop rust.

rustup_toolchain.description: Install rustup and lldb to develop rust.

serie.description: Install serie a terminal git history visualisation tool (better view of branches in history).

localstack.description: Install localstack cmdline utility to create aws tooling.

localstack_tf.description: Install localstack terraform cmdline utility to infrastructure in localstack.

localstack_aws.description: Install localstack aws cmdline utility to manage infrastructure in localstack.

lang.description: Set the language (locale) for the container. Default value is en_US.UTF-8.
